title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 360-9.7 - Powers and responsibilities of the department
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 360-9.7 - Powers and responsibilities of the department

State Regulations

The department may: (a) withhold up to 10 percent of any CHCEP
grant money owed to the district if the district does not comply with the
provisions of section
360-9.6
(h) of
this Subpart; the department may pay the district the withheld amount only when
the district complies with such provisions; and
(b) terminate the demonstration project in a
social services district when it determines that termination would be in the

State's best interest. Written notice of the termination must be provided to
the district not less than 30 days prior to the effective date of the
notice. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
360-9.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
